title: Ep. 571: Steve Koomar: The Real Winners of GOP’s Tax Reform
itunes:title: Steve Koomar: The Real Winners of GOP’s Tax Reform
description: First and foremost, Happy Thanksgiving! If you’re one of the millions of Americans traveling, stuck in traffic, or simply need some time away from the relatives this week - this episode is my gift to you. Today’s guest is Steve Koomar – former derivative trader at Goldman Sachs and editor of the Vigilante Investor newsletter.
